articles.title: Ojjaara (momelotinib) approved in the US as the first and only treatment indicated for myelofibrosis patients with anaemia - GSK
articles.description: Ojjaara is a once-a-day, oral JAK1/JAK2 and activin A receptor type 1 (ACVR1) inhibitor.
articles.content:
• Approval is for use in myelofibrosis patients with anaemia regardless of prior myelofibrosis therapy
